title: How to Get a Humbug: My Singing Monsters Pro Tips & Tutorial

steps.title: Obtain some parent monsters.
steps.content: Obtain some parent monsters. The best parents to breed a Humbug are a Quarrister and one triple-element monster. Some potential combinations are Quarrister and Clamble , Thumpies , PomPom , or Reedling . [1] X Research source This is also the best combination if you're trying to breed a Rare Humbug unless you already have a Humbug. [2] X Research source There is about a 1% chance of successfully breeding a Humbug. If you breed for a Humbug 70 times, you have about a 50% chance of successfully breeding one. If you do 690 breeding attempts, you will have a 99.9% chance of getting at least one Humbug. During a Breeding Bonanza, this chance is increased to 500% to 1000%. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Level the parents to level 4.
steps.content: Level the parents to level 4. Monsters must be at least level 4 to breed, so level up your parent monsters if they're not already at least level 4. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Upgrade your Breeding Structures if you wish.
steps.content: Upgrade your Breeding Structures if you wish. While not necessary, you can upgrade your Breeding Structures to reduce breeding times by 25%. You can upgrade your structure by spending 25 diamonds. You can also add Wishing Torches around your Breeding Structure to help increase the odds of a rare monster being bred. [5] X Research source Wishing Torches can be lit for 24 hours by paying 2 diamonds or be lit permanently by paying 100 diamonds.

steps.title: Breed the parent monsters on Earth Island.
steps.content: Breed the parent monsters on Earth Island. Once you're ready to breed your monsters, put them in the Breeding Structure. A Humbug egg is furry with green and dark green stripes, similar to a Humbug. [6] X Research source To get a Rare Humbug, you'll need to wait until a breeding window opens up. There are some promotions and events where all Rares of a certain element are available. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Wait for your Humbug to hatch.
steps.content: Wait for your Humbug to hatch. By default, a Humbug egg takes 1 day and 12 hours to hatch. However, if you've got enhanced Breeding Structures, it will hatch in 1 day and 3 hours.

steps.title: Humbugs are incredibly rare.
steps.content: Humbugs are incredibly rare. The chance of getting a Humbug is very low, even if you're using the best parents. Try waiting for a Breeding Bonanza for a better chance at getting a Humbug.

steps.title: You're not on Earth Island.
steps.content: You're not on Earth Island. You can only breed a Humbug on Earth Island. Make sure your parent monsters are on Earth Island before you try breeding them.

steps.title: You're using the same combination of parents over and over.
steps.content: You're using the same combination of parents over and over. While this isn't confirmed, some users have superstitions that using the same combo of parents to breed a Monster is unlucky. Since you can breed a Quarrister with any Triple-Element Monster to get a Humbug, try switching up the other parent. The best choices to breed with Quarrister are Clamble, Thumpies, PomPom, and Reedling.
